name: Poker Pusher
description:
Role: Game/Level/Audio Designer & Programming

  • Created & Implemented Drag/Drop Text System with Mouse (Unity) 
  • Created & Implemented Randomized Spawning of Objects Horizontally (Unity)

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Controls:

Player 1:

W - Up

S - Down

Player 2:

Up Arrow - Up

Down Arrow - Down

Dev Team:
